section.about.title: About
section.about.heading: About Me
section.about.text.desktop:
Hi, my name is Melik. I am a frontend developer and UI/UX designer. I create modern and user-friendly websites. After moving to Germany, I focused on digital technology development.

My technical experience helps me quickly learn new tools and approaches in web development and design. The main specialization is adaptive applications for Next.js and React. In my work, I combine engineering precision with design thinking so that interfaces are clear, aesthetic, and support business growth.
section.about.text.mobile: My name is Melik, I am a frontend developer and UI/UX designer. I specialize in creating responsive web applications using React and Next.js . I combine technical precision with a design approach to make interfaces user-friendly, aesthetic, and effective for business.

section.ai.title: AI-Driven Creative Concepts
section.ai.description: Each image here is more than just a visual — it’s a solution: a banner, a product concept, or a marketing-ready design created with AI.
section.ai.video.description: Short animated ads and promo videos powered by AI. Every clip is a dynamic tool to grab attention, tell a story, and enhance any campaign.
section.skills.heading: Skills & Expertise
section.skills.text.desktop: I have a strong technical base and a creative outlook on design. I create modern websites that work fast, look impressive, and at the same time remain user-friendly. It is important to me that each project gives the user an easy and pleasant experience, and the client receives a solution that fully meets his goals and expectations. Key skills: • Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+), React.js, Next.js • Adaptive layout: mobile-first, cross-browser • UI/UX: prototypes, Figma design, user orientation • Optimization: clean and fast code, image customization, lazy loading • Animations and interactive: CSS animations, GSAP, Three.js, working with 3D • Tools: Git, GitHub, Blender, Spline Experience and development path I came to web development from the technical field, where I was involved in CNC and manufacturing. He mastered new technologies through intensive courses and practical projects. I continue to develop, attend webinars and workshops, and study new tools and approaches. I work in several languages—Armenian, Russian, Ukrainian, German (B2 Beruf), and English (A2)—which helps me communicate across cultures and collaborate on international projects.
section.skills.text.mobile: I combine frontend development and UI/UX design to create websites that are fast, responsive, and engaging. Skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js and animations (GSAP, Three.js). Experienced in responsive design, performance optimization, and 3D visuals with Blender & Spline. Transitioned from engineering to web development, continuously upgrading my skills through courses and real projects.
